DESCRIPTION: A squat amphibian with leathery skin, found in relatively dry areas.
A dark green man with the distinct head of a toad.
A huge monster in the shape of a toad.
A tiny burrowing creature, found in moist soil.  It is legless, long and thin.
A worm-like creature with the torso of a man.
A small blue-crested bird living in temperate woodlands, known for its harsh chirps.
A person with the head and wings of a bluejay.
A huge monster in the form of a bluejay.
A small bright red bird with a distinctive crest, found in temperate forests.
A person with the head and wings of a cardinal.
A huge monster in the form of a cardinal.
A small gregarious bird, blue and black with yellow eyes, found in temperate pastures.
A person with the head and wings of a grackle.
A huge monster in the form of a grackle.
A small yellow and black bird.  They feed in the canopy of the forest.
A person with the head and wings of an oriole.
A huge monster in the form of an oriole.
A small black bird with bright red markings under the wings.  They live in the marshland.
A person with the head and wings of a red-winged blackbird.
A huge monster in the form of a red-winged blackbird.
A small flightless bird that lives on arctic shorelines.
A small flightless bird, blue in color, that lives on arctic shorelines.
A small flightless bird, it is the largest of the natural penguins.  It is known for its treks through leagues of glacial ice.
A humanoid with the head, feet, and feathers of a penguin.
A huge monster, shaped like a penguin.
A small bird of prey that is capable of great speed.  They dive on unsuspecting vermin.
A person with the head and wings of a peregrine falcon.
A large bird monster that is the same shape as a peregrine falcon.
A small, brown, flightless bird.  It eats insects and grubs and is known for its keen sense of smell.
A person with the head and feathers of a kiwi.
A large monster with a long nose and brown feathers.
A large flightless bird that runs through the savanna.  It has a long neck and legs.
This is a medium-sized creature with legs and arms, but the long neck and head of an ostrich.
A huge bird monster with extremely long legs and neck.
A small black bird that feeds on carrion.  It is social, very intelligent and knows how to use tools.
A small person with the head and wings of a crow.
A large bird-like monster, even more deadly when found in groups.
A small, foreboding black bird that feeds on carrion.  It is social, very intelligent, and knows how to use tools.

A large bird-like monster, even more deadly when found in groups.
A small, flightless, brightly-colored bird.

A huge monster in the shape of a cassowary.

A monster many times the size of an ordinary kea.
A small white bird that hunts in the coldest reaches of the world.
A person with the wings and head of a snowy owl.
A large bird monster in the shape of a snowy owl.
A tiny brown bird that can be found in most temperate regions.
A person with the head and wings of a sparrow.
A large bird-like monster in the shape of a sparrow.
A small bird with long legs and bill, and a extremely long wingspan.
A person with the head and wings of a stork, also standing on long legs.

A large monster in the shape of a loon.

A large monster in the form of a barn owl.
A tiny parrot found in flocks of many hundreds.  Exceptional birds can be taught to speak.

A large monster in the shape of a parakeet.
A small flightless green parrot.  It is nocturnal and counts itself among the longest-lived birds.

The most intelligent of birds.  It can be found in the rainforest.

A small aquatic bird, prized for its beauty.

A large monster in the form of a swan.

A huge monster in the form of a wren.

A person with the head and wings of an osprey.
A large monster in the form of an osprey.
A large flightless bird.  It is very curious and has been known to follow other creatures.
A feathered person with the head of an emu.
A huge monster in the form of an emu.
A tiny crested parrot.  They are prized as domestic companions.

A large monster in the form of a cockatiel.

A huge monster taking the shape of a peach-faced lovebird.
A tiny black and white bird.  It is one of the most intelligent of the natural creatures.

A huge monster in the shape of a magpie.

A huge monster in the shape of a kestrel.

A huge monster in the shape of an albatross.

A huge monster in the shape of a great horned owl.

A huge monster in the form of an eagle.

A feathered person with a brightly-colored bill.
A huge monster in the shape of a hornbill.
A tiny, colorful bird.  It can be trained to be a pleasant companion.

A huge monster in the form of a masked lovebird.
A tiny brown bird found in open woodlands.
A person with the head and wings of a bushtit.
A huge monster in the form of a bushtit.

A person with the wings and head of a damselfly.
A large monster in the shape of a damselfly.
A tiny nocturnal insect.  It flies toward flames in the night.

A large monster in the form of a moth.
A tiny insect which uses its powerful legs to leap and make noise.
A person with the head and legs of a grasshopper.
A huge creature in the shape of a grasshopper.
A tiny yellow bug.  It has pincers and a stinging tail which can prove fatal.
A person with the head, pincers and tail of a bark scorpion.
A huge monster in the form of a bark scorpion.
A tiny green insect.  It has long, distinctive forelimbs that it uses to catch its prey.

A large monster in the shape of a mantis.
A tiny, blood-sucking bug found in wooded areas.
A person with the head and legs of a tick.
A large monster taking the shape of a tick.

A huge monster in the shape of a louse.
A tiny pest insect.  It feeds on both crops and other bugs.
A person with the head and wings of a thrips.
A huge monster in the form of a thrips.
A tiny land mollusk.  It can be found under rotten logs and in gardens.
A great slug with the torso of a man.  It pulls itself across the ground with its hands for greater speed.
A huge monster in the form of a slug.
A tiny pest insect.  It uses its long nose to suck blood from its host.
A person with the head and wings of a mosquito.
A huge monster in the shape of a mosquito.
A tiny black bug that lacks a web but can leap short distances.
A person with the head and arms of a jumping spider.
A huge monster in the form of a jumping spider.
A tiny insect capable of destroying large wooden structures when in large numbers.
A tiny predatory mollusk.  It is brightly colored.

A large monster in the shape of a gecko.

A small venomous lizard.

A huge beast in the form of a gila monster.
A medium-sized highly social mammalian carnivore.  It has a keen sense of smell.  It can be trained to obey commands.
A small mammalian carnivore.  It is usually domestic and hunts vermin.
A compact offspring of horse and donkey, bred to be a beast of burden.
A medium-sized, hooved herbivore.  Some are domesticated as beasts of burden.
A large hooved, maned herbivore.  They can run swiftly and many are domesticated as steeds.
A large mammalian herbivore.  They often bear large horns and the males are ill-tempered.  They are domesticated for milk and meat.
A medium-sized herding animal.  It is prized for its thick wool coat.
A medium-sized domestic animal.  It has a distinctive snout and corkscrew tail.  It is thought by some to be intelligent.
A medium-sized herding animal.  It is known for its short horns and beard.
A small domestic bird capable of flying short distances.  It is prized for its tasty eggs.
A small rodent with no tail.  It can be found roaming the grassland in herds.  It has three toes on its hind feet.
A small water bird.  It has a long neck and powerful legs meant for swimming and diving.
A large mammalian herbivore.  It is powerfully built and has long curved horns.
A large mammalian herbivore living in cold climates.  It has large antlers and sought-after fur.
A small migratory bird.  It has a very long neck and can be found in lakes and other bodies of water.
A large mammalian herbivore.  It has long fur and curving horns.  It can be found in the mountains.
A large domestic pack animal.  It has a long neck.  It is prized for its hair.
A large domestic animal with a long neck.  It has been bred for its valuable hair.
A small ground-dwelling bird.  It has a featherless head and eats seeds and insects.  It moves about in groups.
A small forest bird.  The male's tail creates an extravagant display for females.  At night, they roost in the trees.
A small forest bird known for the distinctive flaps of skin hanging from its face.  It is prized for its meat.
A small lagomorph with long ears.  It has powerful hind legs which it uses to swiftly avoid predators.  It can be found anywhere from forests to deserts.
A rolling platform for carrying passengers or cargo.
A tiny flying insect found around rotting meat and garbage.  These bugs are widely considered to be a nuisance.
A person with the wings and head of a fly.
A large monster in the shape of a fly.
A small insect that seeks out unwatched food and garbage.  They fear light.
A person with the wings and head of a roach.
A large monster in the shape of a roach.
A tiny insect that can be found almost anywhere outside.
A person with the carapace and head of a beetle.
A large monster in the shape of a beetle.
This tiny insect can be found in huge colonies in the dirt.  They overwhelm their enemies with swarms.  Some have poison bites.
A small insect with large orange wings.  It is admired for its beauty.
A person with the wings and head of a monarch butterfly.
A large monster in the shape of a monarch butterfly.
A tiny flying insect that can be seen at night by its glowing tail.
A person with the wings and head of a firefly.
A large monster in the shape of a firefly.
A relatively large insect found in swamps and marshland.
A person with the wings and head of a dragonfly.
A large monster in the shape of a dragonfly.
A small flying insect that lives in large colonies.  It has a powerful stinger on its tail.  Its hives are prized for their honey.
A small woolly insect that lives in hive colonies.  It has an annoying sting which it rarely uses.
A medium-sized herbivore that lives in the high mountains, able to navigate the slopes despite its hooved feet.
A horned person with the head of a mountain goat.
A huge monster in the form of a mountain goat.
A large rodent that lives in groups in the high mountains.
A person with the head and fur of a hoary marmot.
A large creature the shape of a hoary marmot.
A tiny, jolly humanoid creature that dwells in the fair mountains.  They are known to enjoy drinking liquor and don't care whether it's theirs or not.
A tiny, foul-tempered humanoid creature that dwells in the evil mountains.  They are known to enjoy drinking liquor and will take any unguarded supplies of booze.
A huge aquatic mammal with giant tusks and dense whiskers.  They are thick and blubbery and live almost exclusively on mussels.
A legless person with the head and back flippers of a walrus.
A giant monster in the form of a walrus.
A small oceanic eel-like creature that latches onto the side of its victim and tears into them.
A giant oceanic fish with rows and rows of razor-sharp pointed teeth.
A large eel-like fish found in coastal waters.
A large fish found in coastal temperate waters.
A huge fish covered with growths and spots it uses to hide on the sea bed.  It is not usually aggressive.
A gigantic filter-feeding fish found in tropical oceans.
A gigantic filter-feeding fish found in temperate oceans.
A large nocturnal bottom-dwelling fish.  It is sluggish in movement and found in near-tropical shores.
A large, aggressive, oceanic fish with a mouth full of pointed teeth.  It is capable of great speed.
A large fish which scavenges along tropical and temperate coastal waters.
A giant, striped, oceanic fish known to devour anything in its path.
A medium-sized, aggressive, territorial fish.  It can be found in shallow oceanic waters, and has also been known to travel up large rivers.
A medium-sized fish found in shallow oceanic waters.
A medium-sized fish which shelters in caves on the shallow sea floor.  It hunts for food in packs but is not aggressive.
A large, dangerous fish found hunting in packs in any ocean.
A large, dangerous fish, often found hunting solitarily along coastlines.
A large, flat, camouflaged fish found on the sea floor in temperate waters.  It is quite passive.
A medium-sized, flat, bottom-dwelling fish.
A huge filter-feeding fish with great wings.  They travel the oceans and are curious and friendly.
A medium-sized, flat fish.  It lives near the beach and will defend itself with sharp barbs.
An elusive medium-sized fish found in coastal waters.
A large oceanic fish covered with bony plates.
A medium-sized, brown, snake-like fish found in ocean waters.
A medium-sized fish found around coasts and islands.  It is easy prey for predators.
A medium-sized oceanic fish, often hunted for its meat.
A large oceanic fish.  It is flat, round and red.
A large, big-mouthed fish, found around coral reefs.
A medium-sized oceanic fish.  It is fork-tailed and sought after for its meat.
A giant oceanic creature resembling a huge fish's head connected to a wide tail.
A huge predatory fish found in open ocean.  It has a long pointed bill which it uses to slash and ram.
A huge oceanic fish capable of great speed.  It has a long, sharp snout used for slashing its prey.
A large, flat, oceanic fish.  It dwells on the sea floor, both its eyes on the top side.
A large, long fish with many sharp fangs.  It hunts by ambushing its prey.
A large oceanic fish capable of great speed.
A medium-sized sea mammal with a long thin horn on its nose.  It uses this horn to communicate and break up ice.
A medium-sized creature with the arms and torso on a man, but with the head and tail of a narwhal.
A huge sea monster with an enormous horn on its nose.
A huge, round, hairless river creature.  It is a plant-eating animal but has long tusks and can be aggressive and deadly if disturbed.
A large person with the head of a hippo.
A huge hippo-shaped monster.
A medium-sized fish with a long snout.  It is found in lakes and streams.
A medium-sized fish found in lakes and streams.  They are bottom-feeders and tend to gather in groups.
A medium-sized predatory fish found in lakes and streams.  It is known for its ferocious attacks and interlocking teeth.
A medium-sized, green fish found in temperate lakes.
A small semi-aquatic, egg laying mammal with a bill, flat tail and poison spurs.
A humanoid with the head, tail and poison spurs of a platypus.
A huge monster, the shape of a platypus.
A huge brown creature found in temperate woodland.  It is known for its ferocious attack, usually when it or its young are threatened.
A large person with the head of a grizzly bear.
A huge monster in the shape of a grizzly bear.

A large omnivorous predator found in temperate woodlands.  Mainly living on berries, it will also steal carcasses from other hunters.  Though normally a docile animal, it has been known to kill in a predatory attack.
A large person with the head of a black bear.
A huge monster in the shape of a black bear.
A medium-sized hoofed forest creature that grows its antlers back each year.
A person with the head of a deer.
A huge monster in the form of a deer.
A small carnivorous animal found in temperate climates.  It has orange fur and is known for its cleverness.
A person with the head and tail of a fox.
A huge monster in the shape of a fox.
A small omnivorous animal with a bright mask of fur.  It is nocturnal and found in temperate forests.  It is a curious animal and has been known to steal from civilized areas.
A person with the mask and tail of a raccoon.
A huge monster in the shape of a raccoon.
A medium-sized monkey found in woods and grassland.  It usually lives on roots and insects but can become a pest in civilized areas, roaming in large groups and begging for scraps.
A person with the head and tail of a rhesus macaque.
A large monster in the form of a rhesus macaque.
A large solitary feline.  It is found most often in dense vegetation, ambushing its prey.
A person with the head and tail of a cougar.
A huge monster in the form of a cougar.
A large canine found in temperate regions.  It is territorial and hunts in packs.
A person with the head and tail of a wolf.
A huge monster in the shape of a wolf.
A large, round, lowland rodent.  It lives in burrows in the ground and ventures out to eat.
A person with the head and fur of a groundhog.
A large creature the shape of a groundhog.
A huge reptile, found in rivers and marshlands.  It is an ambush predator, solitary and territorial.
A person with the head and tail of an alligator.
A huge monster in the shape of an alligator.
A medium-sized, red-faced black bird that searches the temperate lands for carrion.
A person with the head and wings of a buzzard.
A huge monster in the form of a buzzard.
A large bear-like creature with a striking coat of black and white hair.  It feeds on bamboo forests.
A giant bear-like creature found in the wildest parts of the world.  It has striking black and white fur.
A humanoid creature with the head and belly of a panda.
A medium-sized semi-aquatic rodent.  It lives in large herds and barks when alarmed.
A huge rodent that walks on tall legs.  Its bark can be heard at large distances.  It is fond of swimming.
A humanoid with the head of a capybara.  It is fond of swimming.
A small mammal with a striped face.  It lives in groups and is ferocious in combat.
A humanoid with the head and stripes of a badger.
A huge monster the shape of a badger.  It is ferocious in combat.
A large mammal with great antlers and a large nose. It lives in temperate forests.
A humanoid with the head and antlers of a moose.
A huge monster the shape of a moose.
A small tree-dwelling mammal with distinctive color.  It rears up on its hind legs when cornered.  It uses its front paws like hands.
A medium-sized, walking red panda with arms and a tail.  It prefers the forest and its beloved trees.
A large monster with the shape of a red panda.
A huge, hairless mammal, found grazing in grasslands in groups.  It eats plants which it lifts up with its long trunk.  When angered, it will attack with its long tusks.
A large person with the trunk and ears of an elephant.
A gigantic monster in elephant form.
A medium-sized animal living in grass and woodland.  It has a large snout with four sharp tusks.  It will aggressively defend itself.
A person with the head of a warthog.
A huge monster warthog with jagged tusks.
A large ferocious predator found in grasslands.  It lives in groups of females and one male with a large mane.  They hunt together and are capable of felling extremely large prey.
A person with the head of a lion.
A gigantic version of the feline predator.  Its giant prides can be found in the wildest, most savage parts of the world.
A large spotted feline found in grass and woodland.  It is known for great speed in hunting.
A spotted person with the head and tail of a leopard.
A gigantic spotted predator, dwarfing its small cousins.  It is found in the wild lands.
A large, muscular, spotted feline found in tropical jungles.  It is solitary and stalks and ambushes its prey.
A spotted person with the head and tail of a jaguar.
A gigantic feline predator, similar to its cousins in all but size.  It can be found in the savage wilderness.
A huge, striped predator.  It is found in almost any climate on a lone hunt for its prey.
An orange striped person with the head of a tiger.
The largest of the giant cats.  It can be found hunting alone in the most savage countryside.
A large spotted feline predator.  It is capable of incredible speed when ambushing its prey.
A spotted person with the head and tail of a cheetah.
A gigantic spotted cat.  It is possibly the fastest animal on land and is found in the savage wilds.
A small hooved creature found in large groups in the grasslands.  It has short horns and moves by leaps and bounds.
A horned person with the head of a gazelle.
A huge monster in the form of a gazelle.
A large monkey with blue face and rump.  It lives in large groups and often survives by destroying crops and stealing garbage.  The males are larger, with powerful jaws.
A blue-rumped person with the head and tail of a mandrill.
A large monster in the form of a mandrill.
A large ape which lives in the tropical forests.  It lives in complex social groups of many members.  Though it is quite intelligent, it has been known for ferocious attacks.
A large ape which lives in the tropical forests.  It is quite intelligent and lives in large and complex social groups.
A huge ape found in the forest.  It lives in small groups eating plants.  The groups are lead by a large dominant male with a silver back.
A huge intelligent ape found in the tropical forests.  It is bright red and found living in the trees.
A medium-sized ape found in the trees.  It is known for its loud calls.
A small, long-armed ape.  It lives in trees and eats fruit.
A small fruit-eating ape, found in the trees.
A small ape found in the trees of the tropical forest.  It is known for its calls.
A small ape found in the trees eating fruit.
A small ape found in pairs, swinging from the trees.
A small ape that swings from the trees, eating fruit.
A small fruit-eating ape, found in the trees.
A small ape from the tropical forest.  It can be found in the trees eating fruit.
A large long-necked creature with a large hump on its sturdy body.  It has been domesticated to carry passengers and cargo but is nonetheless bad-tempered and will spit.
A person with the head and hump of a one-humped camel.
A huge monster the shape of a one-humped camel.
A large, long-necked creature with two fleshy humps on its back.  It is domesticated to carry passengers and cargo.
A person with the head and humps of a two-humped camel.
A huge monster the shape of a two-humped camel.
A huge, predatory reptile found in coastal marshes and river deltas.  It ambushes its prey at the shore and uses its great size to drag the victim under and drown them.
A person with the head and tail of a saltwater crocodile.
A huge monster in the shape of a saltwater crocodile.
A large bird with a featherless red head found in the sky of tropical deserts, scanning the ground for dead carcasses.
A person with the head and wings of a vulture.
A huge monster in the form of a vulture.
A huge herbivore with thick plated skin and powerful build.  It is known for the thick horns on the end of its nose.
A person with the head and horns of a rhinoceros.
A huge monster the shape of a rhinoceros.
A huge leaf-eating mammal.  It has an extremely long neck.  Its skin has a distinctive brown and white pattern.
A person with the head and neck of a giraffe.
A huge monster the shape of a giraffe.
A small mammal known to defend itself ferociously in combat, often fighting off multiple animals many times its size.
A humanoid with the head and stripes of a honey badger.
A huge monster the shape of a honey badger.  It is ferocious in combat.
A medium-sized reptile with a large shell.  It can retreat into its shell to escape predators.
A person with a large shell and the head of a giant tortoise.
A huge monster with an enormous shell.
A small mammal with a leathery hide.  It can roll into a ball to escape predators.
A person with the hide and head of an armadillo.
A large monster the shape of an armadillo.  It has thick armor for skin.
A large hooved animal with curved horns and a thick brown coat.  It is known for its strong odor.
A horned person with the head of a muskox.
A huge monster in the form of a muskox.
A large hooved animal found roaming wild in temperate forests.  The males have long antlers.
A person with the head of an elk.
A huge monster in the form of an elk.
A huge predatory mammal covered in white hair.  It hunts the shores along tundra and glaciers.
A large person with the head of a polar bear.
A huge monster in the shape of a polar bear.
A small, muscular, weasel-like creature.  It is known for its ferocity.
A person with the head and tail of a wolverine.
A large, terrifying monster the shape of a wolverine.
A tiny furry rodent dwelling in the hollow cracks of rocks.  They can be found high in the mountains.
A hairy person with the head and tail of a chinchilla.
A large monster in the shape of a chinchilla.
A transparent and amorphous monster that lives underground.  It is small in size and is found crawling across the cavern floor.  Its organs appear to be floating inside of its body.
A large quadruped with a mane circling its manlike face and hands at the end of its forelimbs.  It lives underground and is fond of raiding the supplies of cavern outposts.

A small underground monster that crawls across the cavern wall with its four clawed hands.  It has a single large eye which can shine with its own light, otherwise its stony skin blends in with the rock.  It has no mouth and is said to feed on evil alone.
A huge cave monster with hundreds of feet moving along the bottom of its long body.  In place of a head, it has an enormous toothy maw.
A large cavern-dwelling humanoid monster.  It has a gaping mouth with many sharp teeth.  It has no eyes and only two digits on each hand and foot.
A tiny amphibian with a long prehensile tail.  It lives in underground swamps and tower-cap forests on which it feeds.
A small rock-eating creature that lives in molten rock.  It scurries on little feet and swims through liquid rock with sharp wings.  It uses magma to digest rock and spits out burning globs.
A tiny underground monster with large claws and horns.  It walks on two legs and is dangerous when encountered in large numbers.
A fearsome, long-toothed mouth the size of a man's head, flying on bat wings.  It is found in deep caves.
A large ball of skin found moving around the debris near underground ponds.  It is there that it absorbs dead matter for food.
A large creature found grazing on mushrooms deep underground.  It walks on two legs and has the head of a bird with the antlers of a great elk.
A snake-like creature living deep underground.  Its head is covered in armor so that is resembles the head of a dragon.
A medium-sized monster walking on two clawed legs.  It has two mouths on the ends of a pair of tentacles.  It uses its mouths to digest its victims with acid and rows of razor-like teeth.
A huge monster with an enormous tail, covered with thick fur.  They run on four legs and can be found deep under the earth.
A tiny underground creature made of a mass of appendages resembling human fingers.  It creeps across the ground like a starfish and eats with a mouth on the bottom of its body.
A large, long-bodied grazer with a thick mane that feeds on the tops of towercap mushrooms deep under the earth.
A gigantic version of its tiny cousin, this long, slimy creature tunnels through the rocks deep underground.
A man-shaped abomination made entirely of blood.  These cursed creatures are only found very near the underworld.
A small bat-like creature with the head of an insect.  It is found deep underground.
A creature that crawls along the cavern ceiling with four long arms.  Its body is shaped as the head of a man with a mouth full of shark teeth.  It waits for its prey to pass below.
A hideous monster that has the body of a giant mole-rat and the torso of a mole-rat man.   It is found deep underground.
A huge monster that lurks in caverns deep under the earth.  It uses its wide beak to reach down and pluck up unsuspecting intruders.
A small creature that lives in watery ditches deep underground.  It has a sharp beak and four tentacles with claws at the end.
A huge emaciated-looking bear with great drooping ears and many sharp teeth.  It is found deep underground.

A gigantic monster, once a dragon, now adapted to and polluted by the underground.  Its wings fall limp at its side.  Its face is full of incredibly long teeth.  Its eyes are large to penetrate the darkness.

A humanoid monster found lurking far underground.  It feigns death, usually near water, until a victim passes by.  It then uses its long arms to drag its prey into the water to drown or strangle them.
Living gabbro in the shape of a man.  These strange creatures are found deep underground.
A small, round humanoid found wandering the caves deep underground.  Most of its body is taken up by a huge tusked mouth.
A floating pod with eye-stalks.  It can spray poison and it gives off poison gas when punctured.
A small humanoid resembling a walking mushroom with arms and legs.  It lives far underground near water and soil.
A strange shapeless life form with an orange leathery skin containing a liquid interior.  It can secrete its internal fluid.
A strange crystalline creature the shape of a man.  It is found deep underground.
A medium-sized underwater mollusk with eight arms.  It is the most clever of its kind.
A person with an octopus in place of a head.
A dangerous water monster known for attacking ships at sea.
A tiny shelled ocean creature with many long legs.  It has two large pincers on its front limbs.
A person with the head and pincers of a crab.
A large monster in the shape of a crab.
A large predatory amphibious mammal.  It is difficult to evade once in the water.
A legless person with the head and back flippers of a leopard seal.
A giant monster in the form of a leopard seal.
A tiny sea mollusk.  It can change color and skin patterns for communication.
A person with a cuttlefish in place of a head.
A huge sea monster in the shape of a cuttlefish.
A huge ocean mammal.  It is a vicious predator and can hunt in groups.

A gigantic monster in the shape of an orca.
A tiny sea creature which dwells on the ocean floor, devoid of senses or motion.
A person in the form of a sponge with arms and legs.

A tiny sea animal that lives in the sand just offshore.  It has a flat body with legs underneath.

A small mud-dwelling amphibian.
An insidious form of vermin.  It lives only to steal food from others.
A fluffy, pudge-filled being, known for its warm heart and stumble bumblings.
A tiny reptile, running on two legs.  It has a horn on the end of its nose.
A tiny creature made up of a series of crackling knobs set at strange angles.
A tiny translucent creature, found in evil forests.
An insect many times the size of its peers.  It is known for its deafening buzz.

A small humanoid creature with a mischievous, toothy grin.

A giant humanoid monster found stomping about in the evil plains.  Their low howls can be heard long before they are seen.
A horse-like creature with a spiral horn growing from its forehead.
A gigantic reptilian creature.  It is magical and can breathe fire.  These monsters can live for thousands of years.
A medium-sized humanoid with the horns and legs of a goat.

A gigantic creature resembling a human, almost unparalleled in size.

A fierce creature from the evil snowy wilds.  It has white fur and a piercing howl.
A tiny, giggling humanoid with lacy wings.
A tiny winged humanoid with shifting colors which performs intricate aerial dances in large groups.
A creature from the evil swamp.  It resembles a squat, wingless bird with powerful beak and legs.  Its blotchy skin is brightly colored.
An evil monster from the swamp.  It resembles a knot of waterlogged weeds but will strike the unaware victim.
A man-shaped creature with the legs of a goat and the empty-eyed skull of a goat.

The manager handles work orders. Once your fortress reaches a certain population, the manager must work in an office to validate work orders.
The chief medical dwarf allows you to see the overall health of dwarves in your fortress.
The broker uses their appraisal skill to allow you to see the value of items in the fortress. They are also the default negotiator with visiting merchants.
The bookkeeper keeps an accurate count of items in the fortress. They work in their office to improve the precision of the count.
